content: Dividends Singapore Saving Bonds (SSB) Bonds REITs Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 31 Mar 2019I've just started working and started investing into some REITs, bonds and SSB. What is an easy way to keep track of my investment returns?1 answerAnswerBump0

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019You can try out  https://stocks.cafe Or use the excel spreadsheet from  http://investmentmoats.com/stock-market-commentary/portfolio-management/introducing-our-free-stock-portfolio-tracker-spreadsheet/1 comment1
